title: Congratulating Zafreen Siddiguee upon the occasion of her designation as recipient of the Patriot's Pen Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating Zafreen Siddiguee upon the occa-
sion of her designation as recipient of the Patriot's Pen Award  by  the
Veterans  of Foreign Wars of The United States William M. Gouse Jr. Post
3211

WHEREAS, It is the custom of this Legislative Body to recognize and  pay
tribute  to  those  exemplary students who have distinguished themselves
through their outstanding commitment,  and  who  have  received  notable
recognition within their academic community; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to  congratu-
late Zafreen Siddiguee upon the occasion of her designation as recipient
of  the Patriot's Pen Award by the Veterans of Foreign Wars (VFW) of The
United States William M. Gouse Jr. Post 3211,  to  be  celebrated  atits
Annual  Voice  of  Democracy and Patriot's Pen Awards in Hicksville, New
York, on Monday, February 28, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, Patriot's Pen gives sixth, seventh and eighth grade  students
the  opportunity  to  express  their  opinion  on  a patriotic theme and
improve upon their writing skills; and
  WHEREAS,  Contestant,  Zafreen  Siddiguee,  submitted  an  outstanding
original essay on this year's theme, "Does Patriotism Still Matter," and
proudly  claimed  second  place for Hicksville Middle School's Patriot's
Pen Award Contest; and
  WHEREAS. Educational competitions which serve to  better  prepare  our
students  for  their  future  participation  in  patriotic  and academic
endeavors, are worthy of praise and support; and
  WHEREAS,  Poised  eagerly  with  enthusiasm  and  determined  purpose,
Zafreen  Siddiguee  now  stands honorably, with just pride in her accom-
plishments and in eager anticipation of future challenges, understanding
and appreciating the caring counsel and support provided by  her  teach-
ers, coaches and parents; and
  WHEREAS,  It is the intent of this Legislative Body to commend and pay
tribute to those young people who, by achieving outstanding  success  in
educational competition, have inspired and brought pride to our majestic
Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
congratulate Zafreen Siddiguee upon the occasion of her  designation  as
recipient  of the Patriot's Pen Award by the Veterans of Foreign Wars of
The United States William M. Gouse Jr. Post 3211; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Hicksville Middle School,  Syosset,  New  York,  and  Zafreen
Siddiguee.
